parameters.name: Sheet
parameters.description: Sheet (layout) name of the input file or an empty string for all sheets

parameters.name: Height
parameters.description: If Size is swDwgPapersUserDefined, then the height of the paper in meters

parameters.name: Width
parameters.description: If Size is swDwgPapersUserDefined, then the width of the paper in meters

title: IImportDxfDwgData.GetPaperSize
description: Gets the size of the paper for the drawing.
signature:
void GetPaperSize( 
   System.String
Sheet
,
   out System.Int32
Size
,
   out System.Double
Height
,
   out System.Double
Width
)

parameters.name: Sheet
parameters.description: Sheet (layout) name of the input file or an empty string for all sheets

parameters.name: Height
parameters.description: If Size is swDwgPapersUserDefined, then the height of the paper in meters

parameters.name: Width
parameters.description: If Size is swDwgPapersUserDefined, then the width of the paper in meters

remarks: This method only supports importing to a drawing; it does not support importing to a part sketch.
